text: (And verily We sent messengers (to mankind) before thee, and We appointed for them wives and offspring�) [13:38]. If he was really a prophet, as he claims to be, the matter of prophethood would have preoccupied him from women�, and so Allah, exalted is He, revealed this verse�.
